about_the_game:
Original score from the game 'Vectorium'. Composed by 'CH3OH'. 17+2 tracks, total length of 78' 14". Provided in 320kbps MP3 file format.

Tracklist

  • 01. Shot-acato (04:06)
  • 02. Swarm of the Vertices (03:05)
  • 03. Bullet Knight (02:50)
  • 04. Deep Ocean (03:23)
  • 05. Ground Zero (04:04)
  • 06. Hive (03:03)
  • 07. War Machine (04:31)
  • 08. Abstract (04:25)
  • 09. Big Sky (04:09)
  • 10. Desert (04:45)
  • 11. Flower (05:15)
  • 12. Polygonal Storm (05:01)
  • 13. Triforce (03:44)
  • 14. The Past (05:05)
  • 15. Mystery (03:31)
  • 16. Unity (05:45)
  • 17. The End (03:24)

Bonus Tracks

  • 18. Mystery (Unused track) (02:59)
  • 19. Unity (Unused track) (04:58)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any operating system that supports the MP3 file format
  • Processor: Any normally functioning CPUs
  • Graphics: Not required
  • Sound Card: Built-in sound chipset
